name: labels_disjoint
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Subtracts one label file from another, effectively creating a label that represents label1 minus label2

inputs.description: Second label file to subtract from the first (e.g., rh.V1.label).
inputs.name: Label 2

inputs.description: Output label file name where the result will be saved (e.g., rh.Occ_V1.label).
inputs.name: Output Name

output-files.description: Resulting output label file after subtraction.
output-files.name: Output File
